title: IP missing
body: So basiclly after a game, i had 1710 ip and was buying a mystery champ shard. When i tried to buy it it said i didnt have enough ip. I reloaded my game and i had 1600. This has happened before where League of Legends took IP from me. Anyone else having this problem?

replies.body:
Your IP balance is likely off. This sometimes happens after we have issues with the store platform or if you're using the Beta Client. You should be able to cause a proper sync of your balance by swapping over to the Legacy Client temporarily to visit the store. You can access the Legacy Client from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this helped!
